entity.name: Real Time With Bill Maher
entity.description: Acerbic comic Bill Maher welcomes a panel of three guests from diverse parts of the political spectrum for a lively discussion of current events. Also usually included as part of the show are a comedic monologue and an interview with a newsmaker or political figure.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @billmaher FFS bill, you always complain & rightly so about false equivalents but without a vaccine for covid-19 the only effective treatment is quarantining, increased personal hygiene, social distancing, mass testing beyond those showing symptoms. Thats the scientific approach right
